title: TALKO CHAT MOBILE APPLICATION
description: Developed a full-featured real-time chat mobile application using React Native with complete messaging functionality, user authentication, and media management capabilities.

title: EYEWEAR STORE E-COMMERCE WEBSITE
description: Developed a comprehensive e-commerce website for an eyewear store featuring product catalog, shopping cart, and virtual try-on functionality with responsive design and modern UI/UX.

title: MOVIE CYBER WEBSITE
description: Developed a fully responsive movie theater website with modern UI/UX design, featuring movie showcase, showtimes management, and interactive user experience components.

title: HONDA AUTOMOTIVE WEBSITE
description: Developed a modern, responsive Honda automotive website showcasing vehicle lineup with interactive features, smooth animations, and mobile-first design approach.
